8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Room Information, Do you provide baby crib bedding?, Yes
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Room Information, What are the room amenities?, Bedding: Usually includes pillows, a comfortable mattress, and clean linens.
Bathroom: Bathroom facilities with towels, toiletries (such as shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and lotion), a shower or bathtub,a hairdryer.

Furniture: A bed (single, double, queen, or king-sized depending on room type), bedside tables, desk, chairs, and sometimes additional seating such as a couch or armchair.
Entertainment: Television with cable or satellite channels, sometimes a DVD player.
Internet: Free Wi-Fi or wired internet access.
Climate Control: Air conditioning and heating systems for temperature control.
Safety: In-room safe for valuables, smoke detectors, and sometimes a fire extinguisher.
Refreshments: Coffee maker, kettle, complimentary tea and coffee supplies, and a selection of desserts. Some rooms may also have a mini-fridge or minibar for storing additional refreshments
Ironing Facilities: Iron and ironing board.
Workspace: Desk or table with a chair and adequate lighting for work or study.
Phone: Direct dial telephone with local and sometimes international calling capabilities.
Clothing Storage: Wardrobe, closet, or drawers for storing clothing and belongings.
Additional Amenities: Depending on the hotel or accommodation, you may find extras such as bathrobes, slippers, umbrellas, extra blankets or pillows
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Room Information, What bathroom amenities are provided?, Toiletries: These commonly include shampoo, conditioner, body wash or soap, and body lotion. Sometimes we provide additional items such as facial cleanser, moisturizer, shower cap, and vanity kits containing cotton swabs and pads.
Towels: Bath towels, hand towels, and washcloths. Sometimes we provide larger towels for use at the pool or spa.
Hairdryer: a hairdryer for guests to use during their stay.
Shower/Bath: The bathroom will typically be equipped with a shower or bathtub, or a combination of both, depending on the room type.
Mirror: A well-lit mirror is often provided for grooming purposes.
Toilet Paper: This essential item is usually stocked in the bathroom.
Additional Items: Such as dental kits (toothbrush and toothpaste), shaving kits, sewing kits, and feminine hygiene products upon request. These items may be available at the front desk or provided directly in the room.
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Room Information, Do you provide dental kits and shaving kits?, Yes

8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Room Information, Are there tea and coffee making facilities in the rooms?, Yes, there is a coffee maker available.
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Room Information, Are there in-room safes for valuables?, Yes
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Room Information, What entertainment facilities are available in the rooms?, Television
Internet Access: Free Wi-Fi or wired internet access is often available
Books or Magazines

8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Hotel Information, What is the style of the hotel?, Nestled in the heart of Hivernage, the Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi transforms its five hectares into an oasis of greenery, tranquility, and luxury, catering to both MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, and Exhibitions) and business travelers, as well as those seeking a lifestyle experience. Adjacent to the bustling life of the Palais des Congrès, come and experience moments tailored for you.

Like the three taps before the curtain rises, entering the hotel is a theatrical experience in three acts: passing through the wrought-iron gate, strolling along the lattice-lined walkway adorned with fountains, and entering the dazzling entrance, where walls of light are adorned with hundreds of candles.
The hustle and bustle of the city fade away. In a soft glide, a sumptuous door opens onto a vestibule of copper: welcome to the palace of the Oasis Master.
The lobby, a true showcase of moucharabieh, reveals the treasure of the estate, its source symbolized by a sleek fountain topped with a monumental copper droplet chandelier, under a grandiose dome.
Surrounded by this cascade of light, you"ll enjoy settling into the perfect elegance of the Oasis Master"s honor lounge. You can also do some shopping in the lobby"s concept store or follow the seguia that extends the fountain on the ground, leading you through the gardens, following the water"s path...
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Hotel Information, What type of breakfast does the hotel offer?, Movenpick offers a breakfast experience characterized by the name "Saray." Whether you prefer an indoor setting with decor influenced by Berber, Arab, and Andalusian styles, or an outdoor ambiance on the shaded terrace adorned with olive trees, Saray welcomes you daily. It serves a generous international buffet featuring an array of flavors and local Moroccan specialties for both breakfast and dinner. 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Hotel Information, What are the breakfast timings?, The breakfast hours are from 7 am to 10:30 am, while dinner is served from 7:00 pm to 10:30 pm at the same restaurtant 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Hotel Information, Is there a swimming pool?, Yes, we have 4 swimming pools
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Hotel Information, Is the pool heated?, Yes, our two pools, including the spa pool and the main pool, are heated to a comfortable 28 degrees 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Hotel Information, Are there poolside services?, Food and Beverage Service: Enjoy a selection of refreshing drinks and delicious snacks delivered directly to your poolside area, whether it"s the main pool, spa pool, or jamra pool.
Towel Service: Fresh towels are provided near the pool area.

Sunbed and Umbrella Setup: Our staff will assist in setting up sunbeds and umbrellas at all pool areas, ensuring you have a comfortable and shaded space to relax.
Poolside Assistance: Our friendly staff are available to assist with any additional needs or inquiries you may have while enjoying your time by the pool, present at all pool areas.
Poolside Shower Service: Convenient showers are available near the pool area for your comfort and refreshment.
Tranquil Garden Equipped with Peaceful Hammocks: Relax and unwind in our serene garden area, complete with comfortable hammocks.
Poolside Entertainment: Depending on the schedule, we offer poolside entertainment such as live music or recreational activities to enhance your experience.

8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Hotel Information, What equipment is available in the gym?, Technogym equipment

8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Payment and Policies, What payment methods do you accept?, VISA/AMEX/MASTERCARD/CASH

8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Restaurant, Saray, Chefs, Interaction, Saray combines Berber, Arab, and Andalusian decor inside or on its shaded terrace with olive trees for breakfast and dinner buffets featuring international and Moroccan cuisine. Chefs lead workshops, enhancing dining experiences with personal touches.,

Drinks and wine menu, Marcelona is a lively, authentic spot celebrating Spanish culture and cuisine. Our Chef crafts Andalusian classics with a refined touch, blending traditional flavors with innovative combinations while respecting Spanish culinary traditions. The menu offers a mix of typical dishes and new tastes, rounded off with signature desserts. Evenings at Marcelona feature a live band, infusing the atmosphere with Andalusian music, enhancing the cultural and gastronomic journey., 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Restaurant, Manso, PIZZAS AND BURGERS
BARBECUE SHOW
REFRESHING COCKTAILS
NICE TRENDY TERRACE
QUICK BITE DURING THE DAY                 
À la carte menu, The Manso Pool Lounge invites you to relax on the terrace or poolside with light Mediterranean and international dishes, blending gourmet tastes with novelty. Throughout the day, enjoy refreshing drinks in a vibrant DJ lounge setting. Open from noon until early evening, this green oasis is the perfect spot for leisure and relaxation., 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Restaurant, Jamra, 

NUTRITION & TASTY FOOD
AND OFFERS HEALTHY SALADS AND PROTEINS, POKE BOWLS
HEALTHY FOOD ON A POOL IN THE HEART OF THE RED CITY
Detox JUICES 
SENSE & BOOST VITALITY, 
Jamra, nestled near the Yoga studio and overlooking a serene, curvilinear pool, harmonizes with its floral and green surroundings. This restaurant serves organic, healthy cuisine with Oriental and Asian touches, featuring vegan, vegetarian, poke bowls, gluten-free, and mezze dishes for a distinctive taste journey. Its healthy juices, infused with botanical flavors, are designed to awaken the senses and enhance vitality, offering a refreshing dining experience.,

THEATRE & RITUAL, At Manso Lounge. Music. Tapas, choose between the cozy indoors or the terrace with views of lush gardens and a pool, to enjoy Mediterranean 'tapas' cuisine amidst a DJ lounge atmosphere with Oriental touches. This intimate and stylish spot is a haven for cocktail enthusiasts, offering custom, delicate concoctions by our bartender. These creations are made with seasonal, carefully chosen spirits, ensuring each drink is a unique experience., 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Spa & well-being, SPA O de Rose by cinq mondes, SPA
relaxation
massage
sauna
hammam
, 
Le Spa Ô de Roses by Cinq Mondes is nestled around two secluded patios below the gardens, in the quietest part of the oasis, featuring massage rooms, hammams, a sauna, and even an outdoor jacuzzi. Its minimalist decor in black and white is accented with copper touches and an oversized water droplet motif, setting the stage for perfect tranquility. The sound of water, the scent of essential oils, and the serene, softly enveloping atmosphere lead guests to moments of ultimate relaxation., 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Spa & well-being, OM Yoga, RETREAT PLACE 
Yoga
Relaxing time
sport, The yoga studio at the Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi, with its balanced decor and top-notch facilities, is designed for the full benefits of peaceful and relaxing yoga practice. Offering over 24 sessions a week, Om Yoga Marrakech hosts classes in 15 different yoga styles, including Bikram, Ashtanga, and Bungee, ensuring there's a yoga experience for everyone. For class descriptions and pricing, visit this website : https://omyoga.ma/studio-marrakech/,

8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Kids Club, Les P'tits Sultans, Kids
kindergarden 
children, The Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi pampers children aged 4 to 12 with the Kids Club, a large, brightly lit space with cheerful colors designed just for them, featuring multiple rooms and small terraces. Over 25 safely supervised activities are offered, ranging from fun learning experiences to creativity-boosting sessions like street art workshops and exciting discoveries, ensuring every child has their moments of joy., 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Membership, ALL, Membership ALL
, Accor Live Limitless (ALL) lets you earn points on stays, dining, and experiences. Redeem them for free nights, upgrades, and more. Plus, get exclusive discounts and higher tiers with perks like room upgrades (subject to your level).
More info in this website: https://all.accor.com/enroll-loyalty/index.en.shtml#/verify-email?contextparam=B4P6&origin=self-enroll, 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Things To Do, Shops, Souvenirs
moroccan dress
shops
, 
The concept store at the Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi is Marrakech's premier shopping destination, featuring a constantly updated selection of trendy products. Discover the perfect gift or find that missing piece for your wardrobe among the brand showcases in the lobby and the designer space overlooking the gardens., 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Things To Do, Arts, Museum
Arts
Paints
, The Mezzanine Art Gallery offers a chic and understated atmosphere to showcase national and international artistic creation. Take an inspiring stroll through this exhibition space that overlooks the lobby. The gallery also serves as a gathering and sharing venue during opening receptions, which are significant cultural events. With a yearly schedule introducing a new artist approximately every two months, visitors can explore a wide range of art forms, including street art, photography, painting, sculpture, and primitive art., 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Things To Do, Celebrations, Flowers
decoration
birthdays
surprise party 
amenities in room , The Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi is your ideal partner for confidently organizing private events and creating unforgettable moments. Whether celebrating something special or simply wanting to gather your loved ones, the Jamra, with its stylish poolside terrace accommodating up to 250 people, chic and timeless decor, and a healthy, diverse menu, is the perfect spot for a trendy and fresh cocktail event. For seated dinners, choose the Saray for its space and terrace with a refined international buffet, or the Dahbi for a gastronomic journey through Moroccan culinary richness., 
8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Things To Do, Day Pass, 
AN INTSGRAMMABLE PLACE
A TRENDY COFFEE WITH A LARGE CHOICE OF TEA

8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Events & Seminars, Conference Rooms, , With nearly 500 flights weekly connecting Marrakech to the globe, the Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi stands as the ideal venue for both professional and private events. 8c9796ee-28f4-4994-bc2c-ead53c32ae89, Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi et Palais des Congrès, Events & Seminars, Event Space, , The Mövenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi excels in hosting private events, offering unforgettable experiences with complete confidence. Imagine your wedding in the enchanting setting of the Oasis Master's palace, celebrating the most significant day of your life with loved ones.

Whether it's a standing reception in the gardens or a dazzling banquet at Saray for up to 350 people indoors and 200 on the terrace, your wedding will surely be a memorable affair.

For those looking to celebrate or simply gather friends and family, the Jamra, with its exquisite poolside terrace accommodating up to 250 guests, chic and timeless decor, and a healthy, diverse menu, is ideal for a trendy, refreshing cocktail party.

For seated dinners, Saray offers its space and terrace with a sophisticated international buffet, or choose the Dahbi for a journey through Moroccan culinary treasures, ensuring a dining experience that marvels and delights.,
